page.title: 18JOBS IN LONGBENTON (1)
page.content:
There are few white collar workers in the area. The majority of men who are in work are involved in manual or semi-skilled jobs. Many married women are forced to work either to supplement their husband's wage or because their husbands are unemployed. Many young people are out of work and for those leaving school the prospects of employment are not promising.
"The unemployment situation is a dreadful state of affairs. 11 years ago in this area there were very many people going to work. Now you only see a few people in the mornings. At one time young people felt sure about getting a job. It's not so easy in 1985. " (Local Parish Priest)...../
